description: Pages management course It is the type of courses that teaches you how to manage any page easily and achieve a good results in a very simple way,you will be thought how to receive a client page and make this page appears when googled ,Facebook and any other search engine , also creating a suitable content according to the client requirements , uploading this content to get the highest reach and response and connecting the post score to the page score which means the more LIKE to the post the more score to the page ,the more followers the more score, as a result for this the page became more fame,more trusted ,also more sales We will teach you also how to reply to the message easily in a simple way saving time and rescheduling the posts to save your time for further tasks.
title: Facebook Page Manager Certificate
instructors: Believe Your Dream, Eman Shafik Mahmoud Ouda
